overview:
Adam Smith manages business operations for Automated Insights, Inc. He is also heavily involved in company strategy and product initiatives, running mobile and video for AI.

Prior to joining StatSheet, Adam was a VP at Square 1 Bank, where he served as Director of a National Division called Square Roots. Adam was recruited by Square 1 to design, develop and launch Square Roots, which focused on pre-vc startups. As part of the program, he worked one-on-one with hundreds of early-stage founders, serving as an advisor providing hands on support with strategy, hiring, operations, sales and fundraising.

Prior to joining Square 1, Adam was Vice President of the Council for Entrepreneurial Development, the largest entrepreneurial support organization in the nation. While at CED, he led a team for The Ewing Marion Kauffman Foundation that authored the FastTrac TechVenture program, a world-renowned training and mentoring program for technology and life science entrepreneurs.

Adam is heavily involved with the North Carolina entrepreneurial community and a rabid fan of UNC sports
